item.title: Research monkeys got loose after a truck overturned on a highway. Their owner, destination, and exact purpose remain shrouded in mystery
item.description: The Mississippi crash is one of at least three major monkey escapes in the U.S. over the past four years.

item.title: Judges order Trump administration to use emergency reserves for SNAP payments during the shutdown
item.description: The administration said it wasn’t allowed to use a contingency fund of about $5 billion for the food-aid program.

item.title: Some Americans will hand out food to trick-or-treaters this Halloween as SNAP benefits are about to end
item.description: KC Neufeld announced on her Denver neighborhood’s Facebook page that her family would be handing out ramen and packs of macaroni and cheese in additio...

item.title: Crypto’s big ‘Uptober’ ends with a whimper, Bitcoin down 4%
item.description: While October didn’t bring in big wins for Bitcoin, one analyst says there’s reason to be optimistic for the cryptocurrency’s growth.

item.title: ‘AI is way beyond the hype phase’: Experts warn businesses must reskill for the new reality
item.description: Companies must not only develop existing talent but also rethink the skills they are sourcing.
